channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bullish Sentiment Spiking
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Last week, the AAII survey showed 41% bearish sentiment and only 25% bullish—a clear edge for the bears. Fast forward one week,...

item.title: A Rebound in Participation
item.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! The percentage of stocks trading above their 50-day moving averages has jumped from 27% to 48% in just over a week. That’s a st...

item.title: The “Trump Effect” (What to Expect)
